review: This was a reluctant purchase because I dislike buying technology that serves a single purpose. I already have a Sony BluRay player but it doesn’t have all the things I want to watch… specifically Korean shows. I was watching them through a laptop connected to my TV but the quality wasn’t great and they buffered & pixilated even though the computer was hard wired to my router. We gave up entirely on Viki because it streamed so poorly and moved on to Drama-Fever which was somewhat of an improvement but not great. Since Drama-Fever streams only Roku we gave it a shot because it was on sale for just under 40-bucks and all I can say is WOW! What a difference in picture quality and having a remote that has some features is a real plus. It was an easy install once I found my router’s password. My only complaint is that I had to provide a credit card or PayPal before I could finish setting up the required Roku account. Watching Drama-Fever is now light years better than with the laptop… picture fills the screen and sub-titles are even larger… plus there’s a 7-second rewind now in case we don’t catch everything that was said. Haven’t done much with it so far but so far it’s great.
